Html:
Hi,
in the last drop you removed 'IMetadataInfo'. But, this was a very good way to set header information in TabControls etc.
Did you prefer another way to set this info's????
What way would you revommend do do this task.

Thanks
Peter

You can have a look at this post, where an approach on how to show some header using WPF bindings is demonstrated:
Prism How-To: Provide metadata to a view that was placed into a region

I hope it helps,
Julian
